title: Law governing Persons and Family Law
title_en: Law governing Persons and Family Law

provisions.title: Article 331
provisions.content: Drafting, consideration and adoption of this Law This Law was drafted in French, considered and adopted in Kinyarwanda.

provisions.title: Article 332 - Repealing provision
provisions.content: Subject to provisions of Article 330 Paragraph 2 this Law, Law nº 42/1988 of 27 October 1988 instituting the Preliminary Title and Book One the Civil Code and all prior legal provisions contrary to this Law are hereby repealed.

provisions.title: Article 333 - Commencement
provisions.content: This Law comes into force on the date of publication in the Official Gazette of the Republic of Rwanda. Kigali, on 28/08/2016 (sé) KAGAME Paul President of the Republic (sé) MUREKEZI Anastase Prime Minister Seen and sealed with the Seal of the Republic: (sé) BUSINGYE Johnston Minister of Justice/Attorney General
